answers.answer: I founded Arc Software, an end to end software development company after working for 25 years in the software industry.
Making sure our customer's love our work completely.
Instagram works really well because all our clients are on Instagram.
Making an inclusive action plan following the basics principles Segmenting, Targeting, Positioning.
Measuring the effectiveness of strategies and their implementation at all levels.
Don't be afraid to experiment and take risks in whatever work you do.
Our key metric is just happiness. Our customer's happiness and employees happiness, because that's the end goal of life, right? To be happy.
My biggest obstacle is connecting with B2B clients, because the gestation period is a lot.

nodes.question: What’s your current position & how did you reach here?
What will success look like for you in your work in the next few weeks?
Which social media platform is working best for your brand at the moment? Why do you think that is?
What have you found to be the most effective marketing tactic/platform, beyond social media?
What are you actively focused on learning about these days and how?
If you had the time to add one more project or tactic, what would it be, and why?
What has been your biggest challenge recently and how did you overcome it?
What is your #1 tip for a new founder?
What is a key metric you’re measuring these days, and why?
What is your biggest goal or obstacle?
